sentences.en: A faintly comic figure, he fears ridicule above all else.
sentences.cn: 他是个不怎么滑稽的人物, 最害怕被人嘲笑.

sentences.en: As a heavy child, she became the object of ridicule from classmates.
sentences.cn: 由于体胖，她成了班上同学嘲笑的对象。

sentences.en: At the time, his ideas were ridiculed.
sentences.cn: 当时他的观点被人讥笑。

sentences.en: Davis was subjected to public ridicule.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯受到了众人的奚落。

sentences.en: Don't hold others up to ridicule.
He became the object of ridicule and scorn.
sentences.cn: 他成了嘲弄和鄙视的对象。

sentences.en: He had become an object of ridicule among the other teachers.
sentences.cn: 他成了其他教师嘲笑的对象。

sentences.en: I admired her all the more for allowing them to ridicule her and never striking back.
sentences.cn: 她能听任他们嘲笑却从不还击，这让我更加敬佩她。

sentences.en: It's not fair to hold me up to ridicule because I can't spell!
sentences.cn: 因为我拼不出来就讥笑我,这是不公平的.

sentences.en: She is an object of ridicule in the tabloid newspapers.
sentences.cn: 她是小报讥笑讽刺的对象。

sentences.en: She was always ready to catch people on the raw and hold them up to ridicule.
sentences.cn: 她专爱揭短处,挑人长相.

sentences.en: Silly mistakes and queer clothes often arouse ridicule.
sentences.cn: 荒谬的错误和古怪的服装常会引起人们的讪笑.

sentences.en: Such a statement could lay her open to ridicule.
sentences.cn: 这种言论会让人家笑话她。

sentences.en: The government’s proposals were held up to ridicule (= suffered ridicule ) by opposition ministers.
sentences.cn: 政府的提案遭到反对党部长们的嘲笑。

sentences.en: The gutter press has held the royals up to ridicule.
sentences.cn: 黄色报刊公然奚落皇室成员。

sentences.en: The process of judicial selection was held up to ridicule.
sentences.cn: 司法选举的过程成为了笑柄。

sentences.en: They seem to draw down ridicule on us.
sentences.cn: 他们似乎要使我们受到嘲笑.

trans.tran_en: unkind laughter or remarks that are intended to make someone or something seem stupid
unkind laughter or remarks that are intended to make someone or something seem stupid
to laugh at a person, idea etc and say that they are stupid

trans.tran_cn: 嘲笑，嘲弄，奚落，使…受嘲笑，取笑
trans.tran_en: to laugh at a person, idea etc and say that they are stupid
